newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: British tug-of-love girl to go home, S.Africa says.
newsitem.headline: British tug-of-love girl to go home, S.Africa says.

text.p: British girl Amy Kelland, snatched by her South African mother and brought to Johannesburg last month, must go home with her father, a South African court ruled on Wednesday.
Mike Kelland applied to the court after his ex-wife Susan Portsmouth flew to Britain and took her nine-year-old daughter who was holidaying with grandparents.
He had won custody of Amy, who had not seen her mother since 1992, after the divorce six years ago.
